metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7164 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
The construct function in puff.cpp in Libtorrent 1.1.0 allows remote torrent trackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault and crash) via a crafted GZIP response.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7164` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtorrent-rasterbar9 - 1.1.1-1
python-libtorrent - 1.1.1-1
python3-libtorrent - 1.1.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libtorrent-rasterbar package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.1-1').
